name: Block crusher
tagline: simple arkanoid clone written in python.
body:
### Block_crusher
Block Crusher is the minimalist clone of a famous 90's game arkanoid.
 
### pygame
we had used pygame as a game library

### future
our future plan may be some opengl(pyglet) arkanoid clone with special effects. 

coder: @piyush3dxyz
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
